author: wsjcom
title: Central Michigan University Student Suspected of Killing Parents Used Gun Registered to Father
text:
MOUNT PLEASANT, Mich.—A 19-year-old student suspected of killing his parents at a Central Michigan University dormitory used a gun that was registered to his father, authorities said Saturday.
James Eric Davis Jr. was arrested without incident shortly after midnight following an intensive daylong search that included more than 100 police officers, some heavily armed in camouflage uniforms, authorities said.
